metadata.title: CVE-2021-40823 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description: A logic error in the room key sharing functionality of matrix-js-sdk (akaMatrix Javascript SDK) before 12.4.1 allows a malicious Matrix homeserverpresent in an encrypted room to steal room encryption keys (via craftedMatrix protocol messages) that were originally sent by affected Matrixclients participating in that room. This allows the homeserver to decryptend-to-end encrypted messages sent by affected clients.

criterions.comment: node-matrix-js-sdk package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
